error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect, did you copy the complete string with the copy button?

data.name: Lock-name in Home Assistant
data.internal_url: Internal Home Assistant URL. Should be accessible in the local network
data.config: Lock-details: [Integration information] in the api-key details

user.description:
Please enter a name for the lock and the internal Home Assistant URL.
Then visit https://app.loqed.com/API-Config and:
* Create an API-key: [add new api-key]
* Copy the [Integration information] value by clicking on the copy button in the detail-page of the just created API-key.
